attributes.action: Allow animals born in 2020 to 2021 to be registered and receive pet health care
attributes.additional_details: Animals who are born in 2020/2021 cannot be registered or receive treatment because of a Coronvirus guideline
attributes.background: Lift the Coronvirus guideline on veterinary practices to register and treat animals born in 2020/2021

rejection.details: Since you started your petition the Government has lifted restrictions on businesses including veterinary practices. How individual veterinary practices open up is a matter for each practice.
